name: How do i even alchemy
description:
The wise mage left you with a list of potions to make, but he didn't gave you the ingredients, so you will have to manage and do your  work with whatever you find

Developed  in the Argentina Train Jam 2019

Theme: Adaptation

#argtrainjam

Credits:

Francisco Delledonne - Programming

Irhi Altamirano - 2D Art

Albert Foster - 2D Art

Jazmin Giolito - Music & sound desing @JazminGiolito https://jazmingiolito.bandcamp.com/

Made with ♥️ and Godot Engine
